00020    /* 
00021    * Constructor.
00022    */
00023    OrthoBoxExternal::OrthoBoxExternal() 
00024     : indConfine_(3),
00025       boundaryPtr_(0),
00026       nAtomType_(0),
00027       isInitialized_(false)
00028    {}
00029    
00030    /* 
00031    * Copy constructor.
00032    */
00033    OrthoBoxExternal::OrthoBoxExternal(const OrthoBoxExternal& other)
00034     : indConfine_(other.indConfine_),
00035       epsilon_(other.epsilon_),
00036       sigma_(other.sigma_),
00037       sigmaCb_(other.sigmaCb_),
00038       cutoff_(other.cutoff_),
00039       coeff_(other.coeff_),
00040       boundaryPtr_(other.boundaryPtr_),
00041       nAtomType_(other.nAtomType_),
00042       isInitialized_(other.isInitialized_)
00043    {}

00045    /* 
00046    * Assignment operator.
00047    */
00048    OrthoBoxExternal& OrthoBoxExternal::operator = (const OrthoBoxExternal& other)
00049    {
00050       indConfine_    = other.indConfine_;
00051       boundaryPtr_   = other.boundaryPtr_;
00052       nAtomType_     = other.nAtomType_;
00053       isInitialized_ = other.isInitialized_;
00054       epsilon_       = other.epsilon_;
00055       sigma_         = other.sigma_;
00056       sigmaCb_       = other.sigmaCb_;
00057       cutoff_        = other.cutoff_;
00058       coeff_         = other.coeff_;
00059       return *this;
00060    }

00062    /* 
00063    * Set nAtomType
00064    */
00065    void OrthoBoxExternal::setNAtomType(int nAtomType) 
00066    {  
00067       if (nAtomType <= 0) {
00068          UTIL_THROW("nAtomType <= 0");
00069       }
00070       if (nAtomType > MaxAtomType) {
00071          UTIL_THROW("nAtomType > OrthoBoxExternal::MaxAtomType");
00072       }
00073       nAtomType_ = nAtomType;
00074    }
00075 
00076    /* 
00077    * Set pointer to the Boundary.
00078    */
00079    void OrthoBoxExternal::setBoundary(Boundary &boundary)
00080    {  boundaryPtr_ = &boundary; }
00081    
00085    void OrthoBoxExternal::setExternalParameter(double externalParameter)
00086    {
00087       // Preconditions
00088       if (!isInitialized_) {
00089          UTIL_THROW("OrthoBoxExternal potential is not initialized");
00090       }
00091 
00092       epsilon_ = externalParameter;
00093    }
00094 
00095    /* 
00096    * Read potential parameters from file.
00097    */
00098    void OrthoBoxExternal::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00099    {
00100       if (nAtomType_ == 0) {
00101          UTIL_THROW("nAtomType must be set before readParam");
00102       }
00103       if (!boundaryPtr_) {
00104          UTIL_THROW("Boundary must be set before readParam");
00105       }
00106    
00107       // Read parameters
00108       //readBegin(in,  "OrthoBoxExternal");
00109       read<int>(in, "indexConfinement", indConfine_);
00110       if (indConfine_ < 0 || indConfine_ > Dimension) {
00111          UTIL_THROW("Invalid index for confinement directions.");
00112       }
00113       read<double>(in, "epsilon", epsilon_);
00114       read<double>(in, "sigma", sigma_);
00115       read<double>(in, "cutoff", cutoff_);
00116       //readEnd(in);
00117 
00118       // Initialize dependent variables (particle number density = 0.7)
00119       sigmaCb_ = sigma_ * sigma_ * sigma_;
00120       coeff_   = 4.0 * epsilon_ * acos(-1.0) / 45.0 * 0.7 * sigmaCb_;
00121 
00122       isInitialized_ = true;
00123    }
00124 
00128    double OrthoBoxExternal::externalParameter() const
00129    {
00130      return epsilon_;
00131    }
00132 
00136    std::string OrthoBoxExternal::className() const
00137    {  return std::string("OrthoBoxExternal"); }
